captions.text: You have to be competitive, but if you’re too aggressive you’re tossed out of the course.
Just because you’re fast doesn’t mean you’re going to win. You need to stay chilled. That’s the most interesting part of the game.
When I heard Red Bull Mini Drome was coming to Japan, I instantly thought I wanted to take part. I had a lot of fun and I'm glad that I won.

title: World's Smallest Velodrome - Red Bull Mini Drome 2012 Japan
